Class WordGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • WordGrid

  • public class WordGrid
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WordGrid()
      Default constructor.
      WordGrid(int rows, int cols)
      Initialize the word search with the specified number of rows and columns and sets the seed of the random number generator.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fillEmptySpaces()
      Fills the empty spaces in the word search grid with random letters.
      void loadFromFile(java.lang.String filename, boolean fillEmptySpaces)
      Given a file name and a boolean, this method tries to fill the grid with as many words as it can from the file.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      Sets the seed of the random number generator.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Generates a string to show the contents of the word search grid.

      Generates a string to show the list of added words.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WordGrid

        public WordGrid()
        Default constructor. Initializes the word search array with a height and width of 10.

      • WordGrid

        public WordGrid(int rows,
        int cols)
        Initialize the word search with the specified number of rows and columns and sets the seed of the random number generator.
        Parameters:
        rows - The number of rows (height) of the array.
        cols - The number of columns (width) of the array.

    • Method Detail

      • setSeed

        public void setSeed(int seed)
        Sets the seed of the random number generator.
        Parameters:
        seed - The number to seed the random number generator with.

      • loadFromFile

        public void loadFromFile(java.lang.String filename,
                boolean fillEmptySpaces)
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Given a file name and a boolean, this method tries to fill the grid with as many words as it can from the file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to read words from.
        fillEmptySpaces - Whether or not to fill the blank spaces with random characters.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • fillEmptySpaces

        public void fillEmptySpaces()
        Fills the empty spaces in the word search grid with random letters.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Generates a string to show the contents of the word search grid.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string showing the contents of the word search grid.

      • wordsInPuzzle

        public java.lang.String wordsInPuzzle()
        Generates a string to show the list of added words.
        Returns:
        A string showing the contents of the word search grid.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
